name: fatmax.com/saperstone-studios
description: Saperstone Studios website tooling needed for localized testing

scripts.unit-test: vendor/phpunit/phpunit/phpunit tests/unit/ --log-junit reports/junit.xml --coverage-clover reports/clover.xml --coverage-html reports/html --whitelist src/
scripts.integration-pre-test: export $(grep -v '^#' .env | xargs); docker build -q -f .docker/sql/Dockerfile -t integration_sql .; INTEGRATION_SQL_ID=`docker run -d -e MYSQL_ALLOW_EMPTY_PASSWORD=no -e MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD=${DB_ROOT} -e MYSQL_DATABASE=${DB_NAME} -e MYSQL_USER=${DB_USER} -e MYSQL_PASSWORD=${DB_PASS} -p ${DB_PORT}:3306 integration_sql;`
scripts.integration-test: export $(grep -v '^#' .env | xargs); vendor/phpunit/phpunit/phpunit tests/integration/ --log-junit reports/junit.xml --coverage-clover reports/clover.xml --coverage-html reports/html --whitelist src/
